articles.description: Manchester United have approached Bayern Munich to enquire about the availability of former Manchester City winger and German international Leroy Sane, according to reports.
articles.content:
Manchester United have approached Bayern Munich to enquire about the availability of former Manchester City star Leroy Sane, according to reports.

articles.author: Adrian Kajumba
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel CONFIRMS Marcos Alonso is set to complete his Barcelona move - Daily Mail
articles.description: Thomas Tuchel has confirmed Chelsea wing-back Marcos Alonso is on the brink of a move to Barcelona. Alonso was left out of the squad for the Everton game at his own request.
articles.content:
Thomas Tuchel has confirmed Chelsea wing-back Marcos Alonso is on the brink of a move to Barcelona.
Alonso was left out of the squad for the Everton game at his own request, and following the £62mil… [+1426 chars]
